title: Bonnie and Clyde
cast: Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Pollard, Gene Hackman, Estelle Parsons, Denver Pyle, Dub Taylor, Evans Evans, Gene Wilder
description: Bonnie Parker and Clyde Barrow are young, in love and on the run during a bullet-riddled bank robbery spree across Depression-ravaged America.

title: Cool Hand Luke
cast: Paul Newman, George Kennedy, J.D. Cannon, Lou Antonio, Robert Drivas, Strother Martin, Jo Van Fleet, Harry Dean Stanton, Dennis Hopper, Joe Don Baker, James Gammon, Wayne Rogers
description: Luke Jackson likes to do things his own way, which leads to a world of hurt when he ends up in a prison camp – and on the wrong side of its warden.

title: The Andy Griffith Show
cast: Andy Griffith, Ron Howard, Don Knotts, Frances Bavier, Howard McNear, Hope Summers
description: Homespun humor and easygoing Sheriff Andy Taylor are at the center of this nostalgic look at Mayberry, a small town filled with lovable characters.

title: Westerplatte Resists
cast: Zygmunt Hübner, Arkadiusz Bazak, Tadeusz Schmidt, Józef Nowak, Tadeusz Pluciński, Bogusz Bilewski
description: At the onset of World War II, a Polish infantry lacking firepower fight to build a strong defense and protect their peninsula against enemy forces.

title: Who's That Knocking at My Door?
cast: Zina Bethune, Harvey Keitel, Anne Collette, Lennard Kuras, Michael Scala, Harry Northup, Susan Wood, Marissa Mathes, Catherine Scorsese
description: A woman's revelation that she was once raped sends her boyfriend, a reformed street thug, into an emotional and spiritual tailspin.
